dict.acceptation: 丰富，大量；充足，充裕，充分；
相当地，充分地；（口）十分，充分；
足够的，很多的，充裕的；很多的；

sent.orig: Keep warm, drink plenty of hot water and get plenty of rest.
sent.trans: 穿暖和些, 多喝热水,多休息.

sent.orig: We believe in taking in plenty of fresh air and getting plenty of exercise.
sent.trans: 我们主张呼吸新鲜空气和参加足够的锻炼。

sent.orig: Here, SOHO, specialist, contract door exploit a plenty of discontinuity, a plenty of successional.
sent.trans: 这里，个体户、专业户、承包户的剥削有的是间断性的，有的是连续性的。

sent.orig: There is plenty here to concern Mr Toyoda.
sent.trans: 还有许多问题令丰田先生忧心忡忡。

sent.orig: Each of them had plenty to say and their faces were flushed with enthusiasm.
sent.trans: 她们各人有许多话，她们的脸一致通红。
